Query the network to find all the transactions locally stored

```graphql
transactions(
  page: PosInteger
): [Transaction]
```


### Arguments

#### [<code style={{ fontWeight: 'normal' }}>transactions.<b>page</b></code>](#)<Bullet />[`PosInteger`](/build/api/schema/scalars/pos-integer) <Badge class="secondary" text="scalar"/>
> 
> 

### Type

#### [`Transaction`](/build/api/schema/objects/transaction) <Badge class="secondary" text="object"/>
> [Transaction] represents a unitary transaction in the Archethic network.
>
